channel.title: Cartoon on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Cartoon on Simba Tango

item.title: Find One Error
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description:
This is a great idea! Trouvez l’erreur! from Les Pas Parfaits de Montréal. Simple, funny and well executed. Drawings by Véronique Paquette. My French is a bit rusty, but I believe the drawings are free to use for non-commercial purposes, and that it is allowed to translate them and incorporate translations in the images.

Makes me want to go to Montréal!

item.title: Mickey Mouse -- The Gallopin' Gaucho (1928)

item.title: La familia dell Tango
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description:
While tidying up the home office, I came over tha 2004 calendar of La familia dell Tango, by Gustavo Reinoso. Which is very cool. I have looked around for cartoonish drawings of tango that might be suitable for using on flyers etc, and this is the best I have seen so far.

Very little information available on the web, it seems, but I found a little at www.ideasamedida.com/ and at www.dinamica.com.ar. The desktop background from which the picture above is taken, is available on the first address.

The drawings in the calendar are even better, playing with the clichés, while rooted in porteño lifestyle. Unfortunately it’s a bit out of date. And I have no idea where to get a new one or other cool products featuring La familia dell Tango.
